title: Blended Learning-Based Instructional Design Scenarios for Ethnic Minority Dance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dance theory and understanding of physical expressiveness
context.additional_context: A short-term undergraduate course aimed at enhancing dance performance skills through understanding minority cultures.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately distinguish and demonstrate ten traditional dance movements of ethnic minorities
Learners can create concept maps reflecting cultural identity when choreographing dance works
Learners can shoot and edit dance practice videos using digital tools (smartphones/tablets) and upload them to online portfolios

resources: Ethnic minority dance expert video materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
